enigma.loaders
Class JavaProgramLoader

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--enigma.loaders.JavaProgramLoader
public class JavaProgramLoader
extends Object

Executes Java programs in the current process. This allows one to avoid manually looking up and invoking the static main method on a class.

Author:
Ethan Royael Nicholas (ethan@ethannicholas.com)
Status:
EXPERIMENTAL. Drastic, incompatible changes may be introduced in the future. You have been warned.
